statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: Consider a simple sequence which only contains positive integers as a1, a2 ... an, and a number k. Define ave(i,j) as the average value of the sub sequence ai ... aj, i<=j. Let’s calculate max(ave(i,j)), 1<=i<=j-k+1<=n.

statement.title: Input
statement.content:
There multiple test cases in the input, each test case contains two lines.
The first line has two integers, N and k (k<=N<=10^5).
The second line has N integers, a1, a2 ... an. All numbers are ranged in [1, 2000].

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For every test case, output one single line contains a real number, which is mentioned in the description, accurate to 0.01.

statement.title: Source
statement.content: 2009 Multi-University Training Contest 19 - Host by BNU
